songs.title: Favorite Problem
songs.lyrics:
(Verse)
Sippin’ on that purple lean, gangster bike got me so mean
Come let’s get a little wilder, let’s wait till the dark is lighter
Can you spark me up your last cigarette, I’ll promise you that you’ll never forget what it feels like to be living larger
Baby party harder

(Pre-Chorus)
My heart’s never wanted anymore than you yet, when I see all those tattoos all over your chest, I want nothing more than to wake in your bed. Next to you, next to you

(Chorus)
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl

(Verse)
I’ll kiss all the ink on your neck, cause baby you do it and you do it the best
Lights off, let’s get a little louder
Hold me for a little longer
I love it when you whisper in my ear, telling me things I always wanna hear
You’re the medicine, doctor
[?] ,softer

(Pre-Chorus)
My heart’s never wanted anything more than you yet, when I see all those tattoos all over your chest, I want nothing more than to wake in your bed. Next to you, next to you

(Chorus)
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl

(Bridge)
And go down, down, down down
Let me stay high, high, high, high
I’m never gonna ground, ground, ground
Never say goodbye, bye, bye, bye
I wanna be your Favorite Problem, let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl

(Chorus)
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl
Let me be your Favorite Problem
Let me be the one who’s never forgotten
Let me be your bad girl, nothing but your bad girl
